{"id":889171994,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1675225607,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/889171994/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        long long quotient = 0;\n  \n        long long x = abs(dividend);\n        long long y = abs(divisor);\n\n        if(divisor == 1) return dividend;\n        if(divisor == -1) {\n            if(dividend == INT_MAX) return INT_MIN;\n            if(dividend == INT_MIN) return INT_MAX;\n            return -dividend;\n        }\n\n        while(x-y >= 0) {\n            x = x - y;\n            quotient++;\n        }\n\n        if(quotient > INT_MAX) return INT_MAX;\n        if(quotient < INT_MIN) return INT_MIN;\n\n        if((dividend < 0 && divisor > 0) || (dividend > 0 && divisor < 0)) return -quotient;\n\n        return quotient;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false}
